name: Backrooms: Nightmare
description:
“If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms, where it’s nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in. God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.”

Backrooms: Nightmare is just another backrooms survival horror game that takes place in an infinite maze of rooms known as The Backrooms. Throughout the game, your goal is to survive the unknown nature of The Backrooms, using the items that you can find in different levels to fight the entities and survive.

 

Backrooms: Nightmare currently has 3 Levels, but more will be added in the future. For every 1000 downloads I’m going to add a new level to the game. Features such as Sandbox and Multiplayer are expected to be added at more stable stages of the game, although Sandbox mode is more likely to be added first. There will be events in which you guys are going to choose a new level/sub-level or even a level that you created yourself, to be added to the Sandbox mode.

 

!!THERE IS COPYRIGHTED MUSIC IN GAME. THE MUSIC WILL BE REMOVED IN PAID VERSION OF THE GAME. IF YOU ARE AUTHOR OF ANY OF THESE SONGS YOU CAN CONTACT ME AT vuplaxd@gmail.com!!

 

Controls: 

-WASD (move)

-SPACE (jump)

-MOUSE (look around)

-LMOUSE CLICK (interact)

-SHIFT (sprint)

-E (pick up)

 

!!KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS!!

-You can noclip through walls with knife

-Some sfx can only be heard on the left headphone

-Entities might get quirky

-There is secret level in game
